title: Looking to make a ranked 5 team,
body:
Hi guys,

I'm looking to make a ranked 5's team (Serious) and want to try and get far with it.

I'm currently gold 3 and do main adc but i will be going over to main mid. Im looking for a ADC,JUNGLE,SUPPORT
that is willing to play serious.

If you are looking for a team add me and we can speak more. "Exotic Dream"

replies.body:
i am ranked silver 1, i main adc and would love to join this team. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
